data.comment: The match has started at Gazprom Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Lesovoy breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Vyacheslav Grulev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In Saint Petersburg, Dejan Lovren (Saint Petersburg) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Artem Dzyuba scores to make it 1-0 at Gazprom Arena.
That's a fine assist from Aleksey Sutormin.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 17, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Vyacheslav Grulev (Dinamo Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg's Sebastian Driussi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Sergei Ivanov awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
In the minute 28, Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 30, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 34, Sergey Parshivlyuk (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Artem Dzyuba gives Saint Petersburg a 2-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 36, In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Malcom hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Saint Petersburg for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 39, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 43, Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Gazprom Arena.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Sergei Ivanov signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in high up the field for Saint Petersburg in Saint Petersburg.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 54, Sandro Schwarz is making the team's first substitution at Gazprom Arena with Nikolay Komlichenko replacing Daniil Lesovoy.
Dinamo Moscow make their second substitution with Charles Kabore replacing Daniil Fomin.
Dinamo Moscow have been given a penalty...
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 55, Magomed Ozdoev (Saint Petersburg) has received a first yellow card.
Nikolay Komlichenko's spot-kick reduces the deficit 2-1.
In the minute 57, In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 58, Saint Petersburg advance rapidly upfield but Sergei Ivanov blows for offside.
Dinamo Moscow are pushing forward but Vyacheslav Grulev's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 59, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 61, Dejan Lovren (Saint Petersburg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Dmitri Chistyakov is replacing Magomed Ozdoev for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 67, Sylvester Igboun is replacing Vyacheslav Grulev for the away team.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 69, Dinamo Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Sebastian Szymanski gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 70, Sardar Azmoun is on a sub for Sebastian Driussi for Saint Petersburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Artem Dzyuba for Saint Petersburg is whistled offside.
The home team replace Malcom with Daler Kuzyaev.
Dinamo Moscow pushes forward through Nikolay Komlichenko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Sardar Azmoun for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, Sergei Ivanov signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Dinamo Moscow's Sylvester Igboun misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergei Ivanov awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Clinton N'Jie is replacing Roman Evgeniev for the away team.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 79, Dinamo Moscow's Nikola Moro gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
At Gazprom Arena, Nikolay Komlichenko has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 82, Sardar Azmoun of Saint Petersburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Saint Petersburg Dinamo Moscow drive forward through Nikola Moro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Saint Petersburg move into a more comfortable 3-1 lead. Sardar Azmoun is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 84, Great play from Aleksey Sutormin to set up the goal.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Dinamo Moscow push upfield but Sergei Ivanov quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 88, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team replace Wendel with Daniil Krugovoy.
Saint Petersburg make their fifth substitution with Aleksandr Yerokhin replacing Aleksey Sutormin.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guillermo Varela (Dinamo Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sergei Ivanov blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
Dmitri Chistyakov (Saint Petersburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
